content: God Is Leading You Out of Here
Those who want no part of God have been culled out.
Brush off the dust and get to your feet, captive Jerusalem!
says, “You were sold for nothing. You’re being bought back for nothing.”

Again, the Master, , says, “Early on, my people went to Egypt and lived, strangers in the land. At the other end, Assyria oppressed them. And now, what have I here?” ’s Decree. “My people are hauled off again for no reason at all. Tyrants on the warpath, whooping it up, and day after day, incessantly, my reputation blackened. Now it’s time that my people know who I am, what I’m made of—yes, that I have something to say. Here I am!”
Breaking the news that all’s well,
Voices! Listen! Your scouts are shouting, thunderclap shouts,
They see with their own eyes
Break into song! Boom it out, ruins of Jerusalem:
Everyone, from one end of the earth to the other,
It Was Our Pains He Carried
But he didn’t begin that way.
Nations all over the world will be in awe, taken aback,
For what was unheard of they’ll see with their own eyes,
